sequence:
The Holy Night of Love and Peace

<size=45>Chapter 1 - Holy Night Photo Shoot!</size>

scripts.say: Guhehe, Sara's just as cute as ever~
Wah! ...Oh, it's just you, Commander. Don't just approach people out of the blue when they're thinking about stuff!
Huh? This is a... brand new camera? And you're giving it to me?
It's my Christmas present? Oh right! Come to think of it, Christmas is just around the corner!
Hm? You want me to take photos of everyone's Christmas experience this year?
Alright, you got it! Just wait here a sec~
Tadaaah! Christmas Photography Mode Gridley, ready to go!
The Holy Night Photo Shoot Extravaganza begins now!
